mapper.select: SELECT order_code , statement_number , order_faulty_divide , `order`.local_category_code , `order`.shop_code , `order`.item_code , order_amount , order_price , receipt_category_code , order_category_code , order_request , order_approval , order_release , head_employee_code , order_faulty_able , statement.statement_name AS faultyDivideName , shop.shop_name AS shopName , item.item_name AS itemName , receiptCate.category_small AS receiptCateName , orderCate.category_small AS orderCateName FROM `order` INNER JOIN statement ON `order`.order_faulty_divide = statement.statement_code INNER JOIN shop ON `order`.local_category_code = shop.local_category_code AND `order`.shop_code = shop.shop_code INNER JOIN item ON `order`.item_code = item.item_code INNER JOIN category AS receiptCate ON `order`.receipt_category_code = receiptCate.category_code INNER JOIN category AS orderCate ON `order`.order_category_code = orderCate.category_code WHERE receipt_category_code <> '704' AND '705' GROUP BY statement_number ORDER BY order_code DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT statement_number) FROM `order` WHERE receipt_category_code <> '704' AND '705'

SELECT statement_number , order_amount , order_price , receipt_category_code , order_category_code , order_request , order_approval , order_release , head_employee_code , order_faulty_able , statement.statement_name AS faultyDivideName , shop.shop_name AS shopName , item.item_name AS itemName , receiptCate.category_small AS receiptCateName , orderCate.category_small AS orderCateName FROM `order` INNER JOIN statement ON `order`.order_faulty_divide = statement.statement_code INNER JOIN shop ON `order`.local_category_code = shop.local_category_code AND `order`.shop_code = shop.shop_code INNER JOIN item ON `order`.item_code = item.item_code INNER JOIN category AS receiptCate ON `order`.receipt_category_code = receiptCate.category_code INNER JOIN category AS orderCate ON `order`.order_category_code = orderCate.category_code WHERE statement_number = #{statementNumber}
